text: aur he meree jaati ke logo! main is (saty ke prachaar) par tumase koee dhan nahin maangata. mera badala to allaah ke oopar hai aur main unhen (apane yahaan se) dhutakaar nahin sakata, jo eemaan laaye hain, nishchay ve apane paalanahaar se milane vaale hain, parantu main dekh raha hoon ki tum jaahilon jaisee baaten kar rahe ho
